00011 //#define MOTORDEBUG 1
00012 
00013 #define MICROSTEPS 16         // 8 or 16
00014 
00015 #define MOTOR12_64KHZ 1 //_BV(CS20)  // no prescale
00016 #define MOTOR12_8KHZ _BV(CS21)   // divide by 8
00017 #define MOTOR12_2KHZ _BV(CS21) | _BV(CS20) // divide by 32
00018 #define MOTOR12_1KHZ _BV(CS22)  // divide by 64
00019 
00020 #define MOTOR34_64KHZ _BV(CS00)  // no prescale
00021 #define MOTOR34_8KHZ _BV(CS01)   // divide by 8
00022 #define MOTOR34_1KHZ _BV(CS01) | _BV(CS00)  // divide by 64
00023 
00024 #define MOTOR1_A 2
00025 #define MOTOR1_B 3
00026 #define MOTOR2_A 1
00027 #define MOTOR2_B 4
00028 #define MOTOR4_A 0
00029 #define MOTOR4_B 6
00030 #define MOTOR3_A 5
00031 #define MOTOR3_B 7
00032 
00033 #define FORWARD 1
00034 #define BACKWARD 2
00035 #define BRAKE 3
00036 #define RELEASE 4
00037 
00038 #define SINGLE 1
00039 #define DOUBLE 2
00040 #define INTERLEAVE 3
00041 #define MICROSTEP 4
00042 
00043 /*
00044 #define LATCH 4
00045 #define LATCH_DDR DDRB
00046 #define LATCH_PORT PORTB
00047 
00048 #define CLK_PORT PORTD
00049 #define CLK_DDR DDRD
00050 #define CLK 4
00051 
00052 #define ENABLE_PORT PORTD
00053 #define ENABLE_DDR DDRD
00054 #define ENABLE 7
00055 
00056 #define SER 0

00058 #define SER_PORT PORTB
